souhritham kuda pidicha venalukal

vila theranavathanidhiyanu souhritham.

Is life meaningless ?

Sometimes i feel that.........but i know that life is precious & i must give meaning to my life.......JESUS I THANK U FOR MY BEING & HAVING

ODE TO AUNG SAN SUU KYI

O HEROINE OF MYANMMER,,,,
I ADMIRE U
YOUR IDEAL R HIGH AS SKY
UR SUFFERINGS R DEEP AS SEA
YET U NEVER CONQUEROR..................
B'CAUSE U R THE STAR OF FREEDOM& PERSEVERANCE

dawn

Don't worry about sunset ......
If there 's sunrise in ur eyes
Eachmoment b'come dawn for u
Don't wait for tomorrow's daybreak ....
.keep a little light in ur pot!
WHEN LONG U OPEN U'R EYES
THE WORLD IS YOURS.....
.BUT WHEN U CLOSE UR EYES
YOU TOO ARE NOT YOURS!!!!!!!!

contradiction

Christ has raised very few complaints against His frs.
He said to Pillip wht didn't u understand me for this long time i was with u?
ther 're booming a great sorrow around us.
our dearones who dwell with us, ,,,,,
but neither we care nor see them...
God has entrusted us a presentation
that is in the form of our relatives & friends .......
.Alas!!!!!!!!we aren't untie even the ribbon on that gift !!!!!!!!!
I think,,we postpond all reverance & love for the exequies!!!!!!!!!!!
then we kiss the one we never kissed !!!!!
Say the holy doings of his previous life that we never uttered !!!!
And place flowers on his chest that we never given in his lifetime!!!! I think,,we postpond all reverance & love for the exequies!!!!!!!!!!!
then we kiss the one we never kissed !!!!!
Say the holy doings of his previous life that we never uttered !!!!
And place flowers on his chest that we never given in his lifetime!!!
WHAT A PITY!!!!!!

hamison



s.s.l.c.student ..... committed suicide on the last exam day.b coz of a quarrel among his peer group!!!!!!!!!!

ban endosulfan...join 4 this ..save our fellowmen.....

The debate is intensifying on the endosulfan issue. The issue is now getting full media attention in Kerala. And for the first time, coverage has surpassed issues such as Plachimada which dwarfs into insignificance when one examines the havoc wrecked by endosulfan in Kasaragod district of Kerala and northern areas of Karnataka. People have been affected by endosulfan in Palakkad and Idukki districts also, though they are yet to be documented.
The Union Minister of State for Agriculture K. V. Thomas’s attempt to speak for the endosulfan lobby has boomeranged on him. The issue snowballed with Mr. Thomas’s speech in the heart of Kasaragod district.
To retain its ground and to pre-empt the Union Ministry for Environment and Forests, the Union Agriculture Ministry announced a new committee to study the issue. C. D. Mayee, who headed an earlier committee that declared that no link had been established between endosulfan and the health problems of people in 11 panchayats of Kasaragod district, was suitably chosen to head the committee. The outcome is predictable, but this time around, public criticism is not going to be doused by its report.
Succor to endosulfan victims was something promised by V. S. Achuthanandan when he was the Opposition. His slow-acting government has taken years to get into action to reach any significant assistance to the victims. (Non-governmental organisations did better than the government.). Now, he has convened a review meeting and made some announcements. But the government is likely to demit office with a half completed study by the State Council for Science, Technology and Environment and credit for providing marginal assistance to the victims.
Core issues like compensation to the victims remain unattended by successive governments. Even the Human Rights Commission is forgetting about fundamental rights to safe drinking water and food when it talks of health facilities alone.
Update (22/12/2010): The Centre has decided to drop Mayee from the committee and decided to appoint a committee headed by a health department official. No package for victims or national ban on the pesticide before the committee submits its report.

where r we?

Man is born into the glorious lap of nature
flowers and plants adorn his cradle.
Light snow on evergreen; autumn leaves in a riot colour,
golden sun on the desert floor
everything,
everything cherished him.
As his dreams and desires he grew up.
He place his first step auspiciously
he swung in the wind
He wished to soar like a bird
and settle in space.
He could fly……………
And settle in space.
He changed the history by his numberless discoveries.
Nobody could trounce him.
but sky abandoned him.
Rain, thunder and tempest frightened him with its destructive floods.
Then he tried to establish his kingdom in the depths of water.
He could swim
and travel through it.
Neither the vast sky , nor the flowing water gave him shelter.
He was immersed in despair and anxiety.
He thought ‘I destroyed the beautiful earth which was gifted to me,
I lost my dream sky, the water and all.
All left leaving me alone.

BUT A LOVING GOD IS THERE TO KEEP YOU AS THE APPLE OF HIS EYE...NEVER ..NEVER BE ALONE
